params.amount: The amount of ALCX to deposit

params.gAmount: the amount of gALCX to withdraw

devdoc.title: A wrapper for single-sided ALCX staking

migrateSource(address,uint256).notice: Set a new staking pool address and migrate funds there

reApprove().notice: Approve the staking pool to move funds in this address, can be called by anyone

stake(uint256).notice: Deposit new funds into the staking pool

unstake(uint256).notice: Withdraw funds from the staking pool
